Subject: Proper Fit of a Corset
Description: We'll cover a basic history of the corset along with common fitting questions. There will be a variety of different corsets, of different qualities and discuss how they effect fit, and what to look for in purchasing or making a corset.  Speakers include:Jessica Haering-Crutchfield - Track: Costuming  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Corset Making 101
Description: This class will cover the basics of making a corset, such as proper seaming techniques, setting a busk, and making boning channels and binding.  Learn how to select proper materials and supplies, and ways you can save a few dollars and still have good results. Each step will be demonstrated as we assemble at least half of a corset in the class.  Speakers include:Jessica Haering-Crutchfield - Track: Costuming, DIY  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
